workflow.name: AI blog post generator with scheduled or prompt-based content for WordPress
workflow.description:
# This n8n template demonstrates how to automate blog post creation with AI and WordPress

This workflow is designed for creators who want to maintain an active blog without spending hours writing ‚Äî while still taking advantage of SEO benefits.  
It connects **OpenAI** and **WordPress** to help you **schedule AI-generated posts** or **create content from simple one- or two-word prompts**.

---

## üß† Good to know

At the time of writing, each AI-generated post will use your **OpenAI API credits** according to your model and usage tier.  
This workflow requires an active **WordPress site** with API access and your **OpenAI API key**.  
Setup is quick ‚Äî in less than **5 minutes**, you can have everything running smoothly!

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è How it works

1. The workflow connects to your **WordPress API** and your **OpenAI account**.  
2. You can choose between two modes:  
   - **Scheduled mode:** AI automatically creates and publishes posts based on your defined schedule.  
   - **Prompt mode:** Enter a short phrase (one or two words) and let AI generate a complete SEO-optimized post.  
3. The generated content is formatted and published directly to your WordPress blog.  
4. You can easily customize prompts, post styles, or scheduling frequency to match your brand and goals.

---

## üöÄ How to use

- Start with the **Manual Trigger** node (as an example) ‚Äî or replace it with other triggers such as **webhooks**, **cron jobs**, or **form submissions**.  
- Adjust your **OpenAI prompts** to fine-tune the tone, structure, or SEO focus of your posts.  
- You can also extend this workflow to automatically share posts on social media or send notifications when new articles go live.

---

## ‚úÖ Requirements

- Active **OpenAI API key**  
- **WordPress site** with API access  

---

## üß© Customising this workflow

AI-powered content creation can be adapted for many purposes. Try using it for:  
- Automated **content calendars**  
- Generating **product descriptions**  
- Creating **newsletter drafts**  
- Building **SEO-focused blogs** effortlessly

workflow.name: Autogenerate Blog Posts using Wordpress and ChatGPT

values.content:
=Give me a relevant topic for my blog. I want only the topic. I have a [area] blog for [your persona], and I want something relevant for this audience. Return only the topic.

Do not repeat topics. Below is the list of current topics on my blog. Always focus on a new area/subarea when a topic already exists.

List of existing topics (in slug): {{ $json.slugs }}

Return only one sentence, without - or other symbols. This will be our topic. Do not send it in slug form.

=You are a generator of deep and comprehensive content for a [area] blog. The blog is focused on [your persona] From the provided topic ({{ $('Choose Right One').item.json.result }}), you will write a title, and from that title, you will write a complete blog post. The title must have up to 12 words and up to 60 characters, including spaces. Ensure the content is highly accurate. It will be read and reviewed by other professionals. The current blog topics (slugs) are: {{ $json.slugs }} ‚Äî use them throughout the text, along with external links, to increase the reliability of my site. Do not use ‚Äúopenai referrer‚Äù or relative links; always use the original link and nothing else. Understand whether I‚Äôm sending you a complete piece of content or a specific topic. Feel free to create, recreate, or adjust it according to a relevant, current, and sensible blog theme. The content to be developed in the post is Ensure you provide the most up-to-date information from guidelines, protocols, directives, articles, and similar relevant online publications when relevant for building this content. Keywords must be specific objects, places, or atmospheres‚Äînot abstract concepts. **Article Formatting Requirements** 1Ô∏è‚É£ **Title (H1):** Ensure unique and assertive titles aligned with user search intent. 2Ô∏è‚É£ **Subtitles (H2 / H3):** Structure the content for SEO optimization. 3Ô∏è‚É£ **Article Structure (Enhanced Readability):** **Introduction** Go straight to the point, avoiding long or generic introductions. Use engaging questions or market trend data to capture the reader‚Äôs attention. **Main Content** Include at least three key knowledge points for depth. Balance short and long sentences for fluent reading. Be thorough, accurate, and descriptive. Ensure the content is extremely relevant and complete, aiming for 3,000‚Äì7,000 words. Include internal links to similar posts distributed throughout the text. The base URL for my blog posts is [https://yourblog.com/blog/[slug](https://yourblog.com/blog/[slug)]. Insert 1‚Äì5 internal links, always matching keywords meaningfully. **Final Section** Avoid generic AI-style summaries; instead, provide insights or practical actions. Do not use the word ‚Äúconclusion‚Äù or similar terms‚Äîjust complete your reasoning naturally. **HTML Formatting** Ensure the article is properly structured in HTML format: * Titles: Use

,

,

appropriately. * Paragraphs: Wrap text in

. * Highlighted Words: Use to emphasize important terms. * Lists: Use

    and
  • for bullet points. Keep the output clean and well-structured, avoiding plain text. Never include suggestions or comments in your responses. **Final JSON Format** ```json { "title": "{Generate an H1 title aligned with market trends, with high click potential, following the keyword strategy. The title should use capitalization only for the first word or proper nouns'}", "content": "{Generate a complete article in HTML including H1, H2, H3 titles, paragraphs, lists, etc.}", "slug": "{Generate a unique, SEO-friendly slug with as few words as possible (minimum of 2), separated by hyphens, such as gina-2025 or 10-better-choices. Do not use accents or similar characters, as they cause issues in some browsers.}" } ```

=You are a WRITER AND EDITOR of content for a [area] blog. The blog is focused on [your persona]

You will not receive the title, content, or slug ‚Äî you will create them to be read by either professionals or laypeople.

Your task is to receive the inputs and return a title, content, and slug, in the provided format.

The content must be well-written, following correct spelling, grammar, and syntax rules.

It should be relevant, written by a professional in accessible yet professional language. Ensure the SEO is extremely strong and relevant to the keywords covered in the topic.

The content must include at least three related keywords throughout the post. Never mention the term ‚Äúkeywords‚Äù or related expressions. They must be inserted contextually and naturally within the text.

The title should use capitalization only for the first word or proper nouns.

The post must go straight to the point ‚Äî do not use terms like ‚ÄúMain Content,‚Äù ‚ÄúContent,‚Äù or similar. Always use H2 and H3 for referencing the keyword(s) of the post. The same applies to the conclusion: avoid terms like ‚ÄúConclusion,‚Äù ‚ÄúClosing,‚Äù or related words. Go directly to your final reasoning. Insert relevant keywords only within the text, in a valid and meaningful context. Never insert them at the end of the text. The post body must contain only the title, slug, and content.

Review and edit all internal links in the post. Consider removing them if they are poorly placed, out of context, or inserted mechanically (for example, ‚ÄúUseful links already inserted in the original text‚Äù or ‚ÄúRelevant links I‚Äôve selected for you‚Äù). These should be corrected.

Ensure the post contains at least three internal links from my site (formatted as https://yoursite.com/blog/[slug]) in relevant keyword contexts. The available internal link slugs are:
{{ $('[CHAT] Order Slugs').item.json.slugs }}

Check all internal links carefully. Maintain a balance between internal and external links received in your input (minimum of 3 internal and 3 external) to guarantee educational continuity and article reliability, based on both internal and external sources. Never cite any of them in isolation or without context ‚Äî they must appear only within meaningful sentences, never as standalone paragraphs for the final reader (whether a medical professional or layperson).

Below is the complete content of the post to be written, already including external link references:
{{ $json.message.content }}

Return the post in HTML format, including title, body, and slug to be used on my blog.

parameters.content:
## Starting

On this template, you can easily get all your posts from your blog (WordPress) and create new ones basead on them.

### Fisrt of All

Set up your credentials: you'll need 2 of them set up: **OpenAI API Key** and **WP User API Key**

*You also can schedule the workflow to run on specific dates, dites or so; or you can just enter a new theme, and that will be generated and posted on your blog.*

### 2. Go to Sitemaps

Change your sitemap URL on both nodes "Get Sitemap"

### OpenAI Nodes

Adjust the prompt to your blog data: blog theme, also known as [area], blog public, also known as [your persona] and blog url, so you'll receive correct internal links to your blog.

## ‚¨ÖÔ∏è Scheduled Auto Post Generator

*Remenber to change the [area] and [your persona] on the OpenAI node with your blog theme and persona*

## Important!

Remember to change every OpenAI interaction, changing [area] or [your persona] with the real ones you want to use.

Also, remember to change the blog URL on the OpenAI nodes

## Sitemaps

Always change the sitemap URL to tour own, so it'll work properly.

You can do it on the "Get Sitemaps" Nodes

### About this Workflow

This workflow is designed for those who don't want to spend so many time writing posts for their blogs, but still know the power of SEO.

It syncs OpenAI and Wordpress, so you can Schedule your posts (AI creates themes) or creating posts by one or two word sentences
